products.title: Bella Blackout Scarlet Red 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Bella Blackout Scarlet Red 89mm Vertical Blind in Red. Made to measure from £14.14 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This 89mm Vertical Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
This daring Scarlet red vertical blind brings drama to any room and is also reduces light through its blackout properties, making this quality made to measure vertical blind a perfect addition to any room that needs optimum light control. Whether its fully closed, binge-watching the latest riveting TV drama, or letting the light in (but keeping your privacy), our vertical blinds are great for privacy for bedroom, living room or office!  A favourite autumnal colour, passionate red is a warm tone, which means for those colder days, this colour brings the heat.  Why not compliment with yellows and oranges for cosy affect, or just pull focus with this shade with minimal contrast.Our best-selling Bella Blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home!At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This fiery red vertical blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service. Still not sure? Why not check out our industry-leading SizeSure measuring-insurance, or if really in rush browse our SwiftTrack blinds, for delivery next day!
 
 Product ID: SDB-VTB1265 Fabric Colour: Scarlet Red Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: White Slimline Headrail Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top or Face Fixable     Slat Width: 89mm Control Type: Smooth Chain Operation with Cord tilt OR Wand Tilt and Pull Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes
